#summary Patter recognition statistics
= Statistic for PatRec =

BioPatRec allows you automatically generate statistics on the accuracy of the offline prediction using:

 * Current data. This mean the loaded [sigFeatures]
 * Group. It will load each {{{*.mat}}} file containing [sigFeatures] from the selected folder. However, the files must be name: 1t.mat, 2t.mat, and so on.

These routines will run OfflinePatRec with the selected settings in the GUI.
